verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev abode יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel בַּשִּׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7851><s%> bash-shit-Tim; in Shittim וַיָּ֣חֶל <S%H2490><s%> vai-Ya-chel began הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and the people לִזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> liz-Not to commit whoredom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- with בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not with the daughters מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av. of Moab

וַתִּקְרֶ֣אןָ <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Re-na And they called לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am, the people לְזִבְחֵ֖י <S%H2077><s%> le-ziv-Chei unto the sacrifices אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hen; of their gods וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-chal did eat הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and the people וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-ta-chav-Vu and bowed down לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-hei-Hen. to their gods

וַיִּצָּ֥מֶד <S%H6775><s%> vai-yitz-Tza-med joined יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel לְבַ֣עַל le-Va-'al פְּע֑וֹר <S%H1187><s%> pe-'or; himself unto Baalpeor וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> vai-yi-char- was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> 'af and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. against Israel

וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, saw פִּֽינְחָס֙ <S%H6372><s%> pi-ne-Chas And when Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar, of Eleazar בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; the priest וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom [it] he rose up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, the congregation וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took רֹ֖מַח <S%H7420><s%> Ro-mach a javelin בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. in his hand

וַ֠יָּבֹא <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo And he went אַחַ֨ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- through הַקֻּבָּ֗ה <S%H6898><s%> hak-kub-Bah, into the tent וַיִּדְקֹר֙ <S%H1856><s%> vai-yid-Kor and thrust אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem, both אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of them through the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah and the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- through קֳבָתָ֑הּ <S%H6897><s%> koa-Tah; her belly וַתֵּֽעָצַר֙ <S%H6113><s%> vat-te-'a-Tzar was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָ֔ה <S%H4046><s%> ham-mag-ge-Fah, So the plague מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al on בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei from the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
